think_procedure: First, I read the description of the knob. I noticed that it mentions a specific value, -1, that changes the function of the knob. Normally, this knob specifies the number of inserted tuples needed to trigger a VACUUM operation. However, when set to -1, it disables the autovacuum feature. This indicates that this knob is a 'special' numerical knob, as it has a special value that breaks its natural order and changes its function.
